name: Fresh Pup
description:
Made in 35 hours for WWU Jam X!

Do you have what it takes to be the freshest pup?!

Battle against 3 different opponents each with their own themes!

This is your one shot to go down in history as the first to dethrone the reigning champ.

----------------

There has a been a minor update fixing most of the scaling issues with resolutions other than 1920x1080! There might still be a couple minor animation issues, but hopefully it's all playable now! Also, you can press the Esc key to bring up an option to exit the game now.
